root.name: Pro Cycling: Season 2009
root.description: Overview The cycling management simulation game is back for the 2009 season. With improved graphics, more in-depth management and new game modes. Management As the manager it is your responsibility to find and sign new young talent via the scouting system. You must also resign you own riders or sign free agent to improve your team. Manage your team well and you can unlock up to 20 new teams. Features Participate in the 20 greatest international cycling events including the real 2009 edition of the Tour de France.Managed one of the 18 official teams from the 2009 season with 20 more teams to unlock.An improved graphics engine for a more beautiful and realistic rendering.Track mode with its new events (200m fly, time trial, and points race).Multiplayer via WIFI-LAN.
